text: GEOTRACES is an international research programme that aims to improve an understanding of biogeochemical cycles in the oceans.
services_texts: The GEOTRACES data extraction service provides an alternative to the full package downloads by providing cruise, domain and variable selection functionality.

ODV-online provides analysis and visualization services for a wide range of environmental data over the Internet. Browser window user interface and functionality mimick interface and functionality of the popular Ocean Data View software (ODV, https://odv.awi.de). This allows previous ODV users to use ODV-online productively without any learning requirement.

For further information see the ODV-online help document or the ODV documentation.
